name: Fader
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
Some stuff explaining about how to use the plugin

And a working example

### Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats, or clone the project with Git by running:

`$ git clone git@github.com:samhicks/fader.git`

Alternatively, you could add the library to your existing Git project by running:


by Sam Hicks [http://github.com/samhicks](http://github.com/samhicks)
tagline: A simple fading slideshow jQuery plugin
